title: Wine With Charlie
description: Meet Charlie, an older man who is set on his way. Daily walks to the grocery store, followed by afternoon glasses of wine with his neighbor, Vera, is how he enjoys spending his days. However, Charlie's reclusive lifestyle has suddenly changed. It starts when a teenage boy recognizes him at the grocery store, and something tells that him his granddaughter, Maddie, might be behind his sudden fame.
author: Brandon Zenner
